meanings.sent1: She will outthrow the ball to the player.
meanings.sent2: He outthrows the trash every morning.
meanings.sent3: The magician tried to outthrow a rabbit from his hat.
meanings.sent4: The sun outthrows its warm rays across the field.
meanings.sent5: The wind outthrows the leaves in all directions.

meanings.definition: The act of throwing or casting out.
meanings.sent1: His outthrow was powerful and accurate.
meanings.sent2: The outthrow of the fishing net caught many fish.
meanings.sent3: The outthrow of the party was unexpected but fun.
meanings.sent4: Her outthrow of emotions overwhelmed her friends.
meanings.sent5: The outthrow of the dice determined the winner.
